title: NBA Opening Night in LA - pick T-Shirt design color

replies.msg:
"About the T-Shirt design - the image Morey tweeted is white background/black text. I know that black shirt/white text is the preferred color scheme. Unfortunately... I'm also told that due to lighting in Staples Arena white shirts will be much more legible on TV and black shirts won't really be visible. What does everyone think about this? Stick with the Morey design, or get a black shirt? Let me know on twitter or by sending me messages here."


https://www.gofundme.com/f/free-hong-kong-tshirts-on-nba-opening-night

The Fundraiser (Sun Lared) is asking for your opinion on the T-Shirt Color.

Please pick one:

black background/white text (same as the picture above) - Thumbs up
or
white background/black text - Thumbs down
Can we have a performance in the after the second quarter?
